description:
Animation Video Maker


Animation: 55 new animation effects added
Operation: Optimize animation effect pop-up window to movable window.
Subtitle line: Optimized the way to add subtitle lines.
Operation: Unable to import Microsoft PowerPoint Presentation.
Operation: Fixed the issue that the import failed when the PPT name contained special characters.
Audio: Fixed the issue where the order of multiple audios could not be adjusted.
Scene: Fixed an issue where applying a scene template would not match the current canvas scale.
Scene: Fixed the issue that after copying a scene, the scene that was copied successfully and the scene that was copied were inconsistent.
Materials: Fixed the issue that dragging and dropping swf format materials failed.
Text: Fixed the issue where the font setting would become invalid after undoing and restoring text editing.
Subtitles: Fixed the issue where the subtitle background would be lost when importing subtitles.
Publish: Fixed the problem that the watermark could not be displayed properly.
Others: Known bugs fixed.
